review_data.title: Lovely small place !!
review_data.content: The western Burger house is a lovely small restaurant next to the Sheraton Zurich Hotel where i was staying. The place serves great Kebabs and burgers. It is very lively and the people running the restaurant are very friendly and gracious. Have eaten there thrice...More

review_data.title: Best Kebab in Zurich.
review_data.content: I often travel to Zurich for business. Kebabs are a guilty pleasure and the Western Burger House is most definitely the best place in town to find them. The owner, Guney, is very friendly. The food is delicious, plentiful, and quickly served. Prices are awesome....More

review_data.title: Quick bite to eat
review_data.content: If you fancy a quick bite to eat try this place. I had fresh chicken and vegetable wrap, substantial portion. I paid around 15CHF, including Turkish Tea. Clean place, good service, friendly place.

review_data.title: Great Doner Kebabs
review_data.content: Nice sidewalk type cafe. Doner Kebabs are as popular as burgers in the states. They are usually available in a roll or a tortilla type wrap. Their wraps are very thin so you do not fill up on bread. Lots of meat, lettuce, and vegetables...More
